bug.short_desc: qx.ui.tree.VirtualTree behaves incorrectly with openMode: "click" and quickSelection: true

long_desc.thetext:
When quickSelection is turned on and openMode is "single" on a VirtualTree widget, the row selection can be made not to correspond with the location of the mouse. In the playground example [1], open both branch1 and branch2, then scroll down until branch2:2 is the lowest displayed tree item. Close branch2 and the selection will no longer correspond to the location of the mouse pointer.
Cheers, Omri
[1] http://tinyurl.com/c5k6jdv
